md:
giải nghĩa từ "chea" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

### 1. Chea (ជា) - Verb

* Meaning: to be, to exist, to have
* Example sentence: ខ្ញុំជាសិស្ស (khnjom chea sis) - I am a student.
* Related words: ជាតិ (chea at) - to have a nationality, ជាមួយ (chea muoy) - to have together.

### 2. Chea (ជា) - Preposition

* Meaning: as, like, in the role of
* Example sentence: ខ្ញុំជាអ្នកសរសេរ (khnjom chea neak sasar) - I am a writer.
* Related words: ជាមួយ (chea muoy) - with, ជាក្រោម (chea kraom) - under.

### 3. Chea (ជា) - Adverb

* Meaning: very, extremely
* Example sentence: វាជាស្រស់ណាស់ (vea chea sros nas) - It's very delicious.
* Related words: ជាទំនង (chea tonnong) - very often, ជាច្រើន (chea chrern) - very many.

Note: The meaning of "chea" can vary depending on the context and the words it is used with.

2. Chea (ជា) - Preposition

3. Chea (ជា) - Adverb
